TextLibrary.Text: You do not belong here, Human. Be gone!
You do not belong here, Human. Be gone!
You do not belong here, Human. Be gone!
You do not belong here, Human. Be gone!
Is this where you faced my ancestor, Bane? Is this where Albion defeated you?
Is this where you faced my ancestor, Bane? Is this where Albion defeated you?
Is this where you faced my ancestor, Bane? Is this where Albion defeated you?
Is this where you faced my ancestor, Bane? Is this where Albion defeated you?
HOW DARE YOU! Albion NEVER defeated me. I am still here - he is DUST! I do not know how you survived - Albion and all of his children were slain! I saw to it myself!
HOW DARE YOU! Albion NEVER defeated me. I am still here - he is DUST! I do not know how you survived - Albion and all of his children were slain! I saw to it myself!
HOW DARE YOU! Albion NEVER defeated me. I am still here - he is DUST! I do not know how you survived - Albion and all of his children were slain! I saw to it myself!
HOW DARE YOU! Albion NEVER defeated me. I am still here - he is DUST! I do not know how you survived - Albion and all of his children were slain! I saw to it myself!
Haven't you read the stories, Bane? One of us ALWAYS survives.
Haven't you read the stories, Bane? One of us ALWAYS survives.
Haven't you read the stories, Bane? One of us ALWAYS survives.
Haven't you read the stories, Bane? One of us ALWAYS survives.
